text: Piet Damen (born 20 July 1934) is a Dutch former professional racing cyclist. He rode the Tour de France in 1958–1961 and 1964 with the best result of 11th place in 1958. Damen won the Peace Race in 1958. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:Dutch male cyclists Category:Sportspeople from North Brabant Category:Giro d'Italia cyclists Category:Tour de France cyclists Category:Vuelta a España cyclists Category:People from Laarbeek
title: Piet Damen
